mapper.sql: select sampling_histority_id, work_order_id, busy_id, tenant_id, liquor_batch_id, pottery_altar_id, sampling_purpose, sampling_weight, sampling_date, sampling_file_date, sampling_file, sampling_file_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from laocz_sampling_histority
mapper.select:
SELECT lwh.work_order_id, lwh.pottery_altar_apply_weight AS ApplyWeight, lwh.pottery_altar_apply_weight AS liquorWeight, lwh.liquor_name, lwh.operation_type, lwh.liquor_batch_id, lwh.liquor_level, lwh.liquor_source, lwh.liquor_round, lwh.liquor_brewing_time, lwh.liquor_flavor_name, lwh.liquor_year, lwh.liquor_content, lwh.pottery_altar_apply_weight, lwt.weighing_tank_number, lwh.remaining_weight, lpam.pottery_altar_number, lwh.area_name, lwh.fire_zone_name, lwh.create_by, lwh.operation_time, lpam.pottery_altar_full_altar_weight, IFNULL(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, lwh.operation_time, lwh.storing_time), 0) AS StorageDuration FROM laocz_sampling_histority lsh LEFT JOIN laocz_wine_history lwh ON lsh.busy_id = lwh.busy_id LEFT JOIN laocz_weighing_tank lwt ON lwh.weighing_tank = lwt.weighing_tank_id LEFT JOIN laocz_pottery_altar_management lpam ON lpam.pottery_altar_id = lwh.pottery_altar_id
and lsh.sampling_histority_id = #{samplingHistorityId}
mapper.insert:
insert into laocz_sampling_histority ( sampling_histority_id , work_order_id ,busy_id, tenant_id , liquor_batch_id , pottery_altar_id , sampling_purpose , sampling_weight , sampling_date , sampling_file_date , sampling_file , create_by , create_time , update_by , update_time , remark) values
( #{item.samplingHistorityId}, #{item.workOrderId},#{item.busyId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.liquorBatchId}, #{item.potteryAltarId}, #{item.samplingPurpose}, #{item.samplingWeight}, #{item.samplingDate}, #{item.samplingFileDate}, #{item.samplingFile}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
